net.sourceforge.aglets.examples.patterns
Class WatcherNotifier

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.aglet.Aglet
      com.ibm.agletx.patterns.Notifier
          net.sourceforge.aglets.examples.patterns.WatcherNotifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class WatcherNotifier
extends Notifier

WatcherNotifier class is a aglet for the file update notification. This aglet stays on a server and keep watching a specifiecd file has updated or not.

Version:
1.02 96/12/28
Author:
Danny B. Lange, Yariv Aridor
See Also:
Notifier, Serialized Form
